name: .I6T File Extension
summary: Learn about .I6T files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: While I6T files are primarily associated with Inform 7, they are not meant to be directly opened by a user. Instead the files are referenced by the Inform 7 compiler during the compilation process.
Since I6T files are saved in plain text, you can also open them with a plain text editor, such as Microsoft Notepad (Windows) or Apple TextEdit (macOS).

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
